tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
When my husband fainted at home and I rushed him to Max Shalimar Bagh, the very strong team of Cardiology led by Dr. Naveen Bhamri took over the case. 
Not a minute was wasted. All necessary tests were conducted within a matter of hours. 
Dr. Bhamri informed us about the case complications and also the possible treatments available for it. 
His ********* *********, detailed explanations, accompanied by diagrams reassured us that we were in safe hands. 
And while he briefed us about all possible treatments, he allowed us to choose the treatment that we wanted to go for which clearly told us that he is a non-commercial doctor. 
Since ours was a complicated case, he researched and sought the help of other senior Cardiologists like Dr. Balbir Singh for carrying out the surgical procedure. He also lined up at least three back up support teams and necessary infrastructure to ensure that the procedure is carried out successfully. 
Dr. Bhamri personally supervised the post surgery recovery calling up every few hours to check on my husband‚Äôs condition. 
Even when we were discharged from the hospital, his office called up to check about my husband‚Äôs well being. 
A dynamic combination of dedication, commitment and medical expertise- that‚Äôs Dr. Naveen Bhamri for you‚ùóÔ∏è
Thank you sir for everything‚ùóÔ∏è We are eternally grateful to you and your team of Cardiology. 
We are also immensely thankful to Dr. Pankaj, Dr. Gaurav, Dr. Sudhanshu and Dr. Aggarwal for guiding us, treating us and motivating us. 
Thank you Doctorsüôèüèª
Gagan and Shruti Gupta 
Delhi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** *** ** *** **** *** ****** An amazing doctor not only for the treatment he gave but also for the comfort he shared with the family in testing times.
 Dr.Bhamri treated my mother for Aortic Valve replacement (TAVI process), a critical case but handled exceptionally well by him. The support team including Mr Sumit was very cooperative and handled all our queries very well and ensured we don not have any issues during the process. 
Many thanks Dr. NAVEEN BHAMRI.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hello Dr. Naveen Bhamri,Just wanted to acknowledge your efforts in the recent angioplasty procedure for my 60 years old mom this month.I kept dreading after her first heart attack in US this June 2022. Back then, we went to one of the renowned heart hospital in New Jersey for the angioplasty which didn't really get successful due to 100% blockage. After reaching back to India, every day was so difficult with my mom in terms of walking, breathing etc., making us pursue again the angioplasty at one of the top notch hospital  in cardiology at national level.The doctors over there too weren't really able to place stents due to 100% blockage. We lost all hopes and have almost accepted the fate of multiple medicines paralleled with side effects for the entire life.That was the time when we got to know about you Dr. Naveen Bhamri (Max, Shalimar Bhagh - Delhi). You and your team have strategized the procedure and on the final day (15 Nov 2022) enagaged for close to two hours and made the impossible as 'successfully possible'. You have solved the problem while minimizing the risk.My mom is really lucky to have your hands on her heart problem.  She at times refer you as the "King of Hearts" and never gets tired admiring your nature and intellect. Many thanks Dr. Naveen Bhamri for all the good work you have been doing in this critical field of Medical Science.Regards,Dr. Rohit GuptaSonipat, Haryana

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Having experienced for many years,  * **** ** ***** ** ** *** ***  **** ** *** ****** He had been treating my mother (80 plus years age) for heart related ailments. Strongly recommend for  expertise in the domain and the Professional approach and good connect with the patient.  Despite his ver busy schedule  Dr  Bamri makes it a point to be accessible . Biggest is the factor is the best advice we got from time to time.  Prompt attention in the event my mother had to hospitalized at Max Shalimar.  Trust factor is biggest plus when one consults Dr Bamri
reply_text: Thankyou soo much for your kind words üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from severe chest pain. One of my reletive suggested me For Dr Bhamri. We rushed to them in emergency. there whole team started the life saving process, not a single miniute was wasted. Dr Bhamri and his team is very polite and understanding. They have done my angiography. I have a clot in on of artry they removed the clot without any stenting. Never seen a doctor like him who really understands the patient‚Äôs problem and don‚Äôt do any unnecessary stenting.
Dr Bhamri‚Äôs team was also very helpfull Dr Sumit Rana and Mr Amit Kumar they both helped us alot and calm down my family. 
Thank you soo much Dr Bhamri and his team.

Regards 
Naman Jain
reply_text: Thankyou Dear for your positive feedback about out team . This will act as a motivator for us . God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Angioplasty and Stenting,Coronary Angioplasty / Bypass Surgery,
review:
We all are very grateful to Dr Naveen Bhamri for treating my mother , I would like to describe that Dr Naveen was a thorough professional in explaning to us about the problem and how he will deal with it as we were all from a non medico background ...he did an excellent job of angioplasty as my mother had a very complex and complicated case but Dr Naveen handled it with his extreme professionalism and I would like to add he s the best in Delhi ..no doubt or second thoughts about it ..would highly recommend him .
I would also like to thanks his staff .. especially Roma and Sumit.. they were ever so helpful all the time .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Naveen Bhamri is very patient centric and humble doctor. I have taken my mother to MAX Shalimar Bagh for angiography. She is already a heart patient with a stent in her heart. Dr. Bhamri informed us about the case complications and also the possible treatments available for it. His excellent diagnosis including referring of old treatment disc during angiography, understanding of the complete case, detailed explanations with all possible images reassured us that we are taking the right decision and my mother is in the safe hands. He gives ample of time to his patients and looks into each and every detail to ensure his patients get the best of care and treatment.
Dr Bhamri and his team is very polite, committed, helpful and has medical expertise. Mr. Amit helped us a lot in hospital processes.
Thank you so much sir!!

tags: None
review:
My father complained of severe chest pain & was suggested angiography after echo. We came to know about Dr.Bhamri from my colleague's great experience with him so we went there and we were treated with utmost promptness by Dr.Bhamri's staff. Major obstruction was found on both of the sides during angiography which was to be treated urgently & on priority as noticed by me as well. It was a life threatening condition & i still get scared while thinking about it.
I am thankful to Dr.Bhamri & his team as because of their expertise in the field they were able to normalize the condition & gave the joy back to us.
Thank you so much Sir!!
reply_text: Thanks for the Appreciation and ur faith in me and my team . God bless him

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: My father is a coronary artery disease patient on dialysis. His AV fistula and permcath were not working and he had no alternative for Dialysis. His Permcath in neck region was stuck in the vessel and since he had a permanent pacemaker in left side of  chest, it was difficult to take out the defunct Permcath. Dr Bhamri helped us in this difficult situation and took out the old Permcath and inserted a new Permcath in the same region. He did this while keeping us apprised of the situation as well as the risks associated with it. We are grateful to him for helping my father.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had consulted Dr.Naveen Bhamri for my mother‚Äôs peripheral vascular insufficiency problem.he explained overall condition and treatment plan to us.As my mother‚Äôs problem was chronic it was a bit complicated case but thanks to dr.bhamri and his team,the angioplasty had been done and the results are excellent.with each passing day my mother‚Äôs condition is improving,earlier she was not even able to walk but now she is able to walk and do all the daily activities.All this is because of Dr.Bhamri..Thank u sir....

review:
*** ****** ****** ** *** **** ****** * **** ******** **** *** his coworker Dr. Sumit and Mr. Amit are the best team member. My husband got a heart attack at age of 25 I was scared to death but the speed of action they took and save my husband life was speechless. They don't promote costly methods. He is the only doctor who treats my husband without putting stunts. He is the one who helps us to save our money.
And no words about Dr Sumit he is the one who took me out of the depression. He understands my feelings and makes me calm. After the incident, my husband was going through anxiety he is the one who make him calm and relax. He even provides his support. Even at midnight, we called him and he is the one who took the call happily and help us with all the problems we were going through.
Me. Amit the helping hand of Dr Naveen Bhamri after my husband incident my father in law go through angiography he is the one who took it. care of each and everything. Set our meeting with doctor books our medicines and most importantly he makes calm. Without his help, we won't be able to manage hospital chose and one more is happening.
I like to thank the cardiologist department for saving my family and helping us to go through this tough time by making it easy for us.
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words . God bless you

I admitted my father in max hospital last week, and Dr Naveen said that he will treat him considering his own father, and after treatment my father is recovering. He even remembered his treatment and issues after a week. Hope to get a regular checkup so that father will not face any issues in the future.  

Surely recommend Dr. Naveen for Cardio related issues! 

Thanks!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had sudden Angina pain in Aug 21 and was rushed to the hospital. Dr Naveen Bhamri opened the blockage in the cath lab and kept me informed of what he was doing. He also made sure that I was comfortable during the procedure. I was relieved off the pain. Since then I am getting regular checkup from him and I am quite comfortable. I feel confident that I am in safe hands.

tags: None
review: The doctor was short on time. The services here in this hospital is very expensive for TMT and Echo I have to pay nearly Rs 11000 including consultation. After spending this much amount nobody would expect Doctor to be busy. All doctors must give time to their patients.
reply_text: I am sorry for your bad experience , may be i was busy in some emergency but still you can come again and discuss your problems directly in my chamber

Dr Bhamri is the finest cardiologist .
I was suffering from breathing problem after visit to Dr Bhamri , found out that due artery blockage 90%
The procedure was tough as it was calicified .
Finally after procedure of 1 hr it was done and now I'm back to normal routine

Regards 
Dr CP sharma

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: It was a very good and satisfactory visit and Dr Naveen was very calm. I had previously gone to one of the highest rated hospital and they were simply in a rush to get me admitted and operated upon even though the symptoms aren't that critical. They were only using scary words. I wanted to take a second opinion and Dr Naveen explained my situation very well. He asked for a further test without jumping to conclusion and maintained optimism towards the condition which I  feel is difficult to find these days in private hospitals.
reply_text: Thankyou so much for your feedback

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My father is a patient of post CABG. 10 years before CABG was done in Kolkata Apollo. After 10 years he had again 2 blockage.  Then we went to DR Naveen Bhamri. He has done the angioplasty. My father's RCA was 100/ block. Dr Bhamri has done the angioplasty. It was very difficult n tough job because the blockage was 11 yrs old n 100/ occluded artery. But DR Bhamri n his team has successfully done the angioplasty. And most importantly , his behavior is very good. So I recommend Dr Bhamri for cardiac problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: On the night of 20th Dec, I was face to face with certain death. I was gasping for breath, my heart had reduced functioning to almost 16 per cent. I was shifted to nearby Max Hospital, Shalimar Bagh. Dr Naveen Bhamri, HOD Cardiology, immediately took over my treatment. And I survived. Thank you Dr Bhamri, you are an angel to me.R S Pawar

review: I visited Max Hospital in 2014 due to discomfort in chest.  CAG was performed by Dr. Navin Bhamri  & with my consent he decided to use this new technology  Absorb 3.5X 12 MM stent. It‚Äôs been almost 5 years now & I am doing very well with no symptoms or issues at all. I am happy that I decided to go ahead with Dr. Bhamri‚Äôs decision for using this stent.  Very  impressed & thankful to him for his wisdom & Knowledge. I would strongly recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Bhamri has looked after my friend who had a stent previously implanted by someone else but he again started having pain and than Dr.Bhamri saw that the previous stent has blocked,so he opened it.
The way he explained everything and the final result was very informative.
My friend is doing fine and he has been given a new lease of life by Dr.Bhamri.
